definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
lit. the body is the revolution's capital/fig. good health is a prerequisite for work (Mao Zedong's saying)
pinyin: shen1 ti3 shi4 ge2 ming4 de5 ben3 qian2

definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]

pinyin: shen1 ti3 zhi4 liang4 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: However, satisfaction also appears to be influenced by psychologic factors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，满意程度似乎也是整个身体的影响因素之一。

sentences.english: Feel the body relax, feel the tenseness disappear, but do not fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 感觉身体放松，感觉绷紧消失，但是不要睡着。

sentences.english: Keep your body in a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 保持你的身体在一个中立的立场。

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊虫叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺喷洒化学物质的身体。

sentences.english: The body of the Tathagata is adamantine and indestructible.
sentences.chinese: 如来的身体是金刚体，牢不可破。

sentences.english: She had the good fortune to BE in excellent health all her life.
sentences.chinese: 她一辈子身体都很好，真有福气。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身体语言，已被广泛地研究社会心理学。

sentences.english: Body ranges from light to full.
sentences.chinese: 身体分布在从光到深浓的范围内。

sentences.english: "The work station should fit your body like a comfortable pair of shoes, " Young said.
sentences.chinese: 工作间对你的身体来说应该像一双合脚的鞋子。

sentences.english: You look as well as you did ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你的身体看起来还和十年前一样好。

sentences.english: R. C. – Of discourse, of the body, that is what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 关于论述，关于身体，那是我的意思。

sentences.english: Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 别推下来，但使用面对身体来驱动头向前。

sentences.english: Much of the body's energy is wasted uselessly .
sentences.chinese: 多数的身体的能量就这样白白浪费了。

sentences.english: None of these champions remotely resembles the long-side illustration.
sentences.chinese: 插图显示没有一个冠军使用类似长的身体姿势的姿势。

sentences.english: The farmland great body didn't move and just seeing at Helen chillily.
sentences.chinese: 田宏的身体没有动，只是冷冷的看着海伦。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
the four limbs of the body
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
